title: Kha'Zix is just not in the Meta. He can't fit the jungle, he can't fit anywhere.
body: Kha'zix currently stands in the top 5 lowest win-rate champions. The jungle doesn't help him at all because of him being super squishy. Trying to isolate a camp to do the clear faster only makes it harder to kill the camp and you lose a lot of HP making his early game horrendously weak. Kha'zix is way too reliant on isolation to even do damage, so he can be outpicked easily by other junglers. Also the rise of tank junglers makes Kha'zix too easy to counter and only just makes it more difficult for him to keep up. He as a overall champion can't do much in helping the team except picking off kills himself when someone is roaming (Which he is supposed to do), but if you compare him to other jungler assassins, I.E. Rengar, he is much stronger in the jungler has LOTS of options in his kit than Kha'Zix. If you Kha'zix top lane, he is already out classed by majority of the top laners because of his weak dueling power. I think Kha'zix has a strong kit in terms of damage and mid-game power, but he doesn't have enough to fit the meta :(. {{champion:121}} {{item:3070}} Possibly a Kha'zix buff next patch?

replies.body:
- Make Q always deal isolated damage against monsters if no champions are nearby
- Slightly reduce isolated range
- Buff R evolution slightly
- Improve base stats

Why do I say no? maybe because he works in silver(5... heh). but right now he's sitting really pretty. why he has such a low win rate is not because he's weak, but because his play style is way different than most other jungles. He's an assassin with a lot of mobility but a lot of paths to go off, and he relies on isolation (warding benefits him greatly bye lvl 2 trinket at lvl 9!). But the reason I say no is because if riot buffs him, they will nerf him probably again really soon, maybe changing his power angle and trying to make him something he's not (hello evolving/maxing w) Kha'zixs is a high-mobility assassin that works well in counter-jungling, stealing, objectives(evolved Q is a BEAST), and his only problem with win-rate is because he is restricted by his versatility (the irony!) because only one path works and people sometimes don't follow that. (HA when i first started playing him I was failing so much, building 3 tank items really doesn't inspire much fear to taste. lost like 90% of games then until i found something that worked) id like to hear your comments, but buffing him really isn't going to help, its going to give the balance team a headache because he's... sensitive.

think Lee Sin is oppressive? Kha has had every part of his kit gutted since release and he was still a strong jungle pick.

Look at what he has on his BASE kit - AA steroid that slows when coming out of vision range, massive low CD nuke, ranged AD scaling nuke that slows and grants vision, AD scaling gap closer/escape/mobility, and 2 stealths with added movement speed. This is w/o evolutions.

Kha is possibly the most overloaded champion ever created and he's only kept in check by bad numbers.

Heres where you're wrong. His evolved W is what grants him vision. His "low CD nuke" does jack shit if a target isn't isolated, hell even when its evolved. His escape has a HUGE ass cooldown unless you actually get a kill to get the reset. His W is no where near "A nuke", it has a high CD, its a skill shot, and its slow and HP heal suck, his only main damage is Q which is weak since is heavily reliant on isolation.

Look at what Rengar has in his base kit. He has a passive that basically allows him to be anywhere on the map and do stealth kills from a bush. He has a ferocity steroid that can reset his abilities either wanting more Q damage + auto attack speed, or W AOE HP heal, or E-BOLA which is a root CC. He has slows, heals, and heavy damage from Q (CDR is even more scary 0.0). His ult is free invis for a duration allowing him to just jump, Kha'zix has to use 2 abilites to get to his target, ULT and JUMP.  Kha'zix slow and heal is very weak, and not only that, Rengar has the bonetooth necklace which stacks on kills making his ult even more powerful! 

Lee sin is lee sin, he has more ways to stick his target other than that I can't say much. 

So tell me where Kha'zixs base kit is any good?

100% of what you're saying is because his kit has been gutted multiple times, MULTIPLE.

Unevolved Kha Q used to do a LOT more both isolated and unisolated and it used to be a LOT easier to isolate 
Unevolved Kha W was castable during his E.
Unevolved Kha E used to have 0.8 bonus AD ratio
Unevolved Kha R could be casted in a second after the first cast instead of 2.

So yeah his base kit is weaker now but that's because of how much power Riot's taken away from him.

Kha'zik is fine and can still hyper carry, however that being said I run a tank page for him now to make clearing easier (armor reds, scaling health seals and armor quints) and can a test to how poor Kha'zix feels without one. However I do think Riot should do something about the sad state of his ultimate evolution as it is inferior to every other evolution in terms of damage, utility and mobility. 

They removed the damage reduction for good reason, but the problem is that left it as inferior to everything else. Evolving his ultimate past level 9 and the enemy probably has at least one Oracles Lens which totally shuts down the stealth and Leap his a far more versatile anyway in terms of mobility. Also Q brings more general damage that he needs as a jungler in order to clear camps. I would bring back the damage reduction on his ultimate (Not the full 50% but probably 20% and then fine tune) as it gives the ultimate evolution a niche that other evolutions don't fill, tankiness.
I doubt riot will give his stealth durability back. They took it off Akali too.
